title: Teach Me Too♪
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Karin-san~, I want to learn makeup too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? Makeup?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I heard about it from Hanamaru-chan. That you made her look more mature~. I want to have a little bit of a makeover too…. Please, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Geez, you two already look good…. You’re cute enough as you are, why do you want to look more mature?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh~, I want to look more mature and go play somewhere that’s a little more adult-like in Tokyo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I see. What kind of place is “somewhere a little more adult-like”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh? Umm, umm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, would you like me to take you there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh!? Can I!? I want to go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Leave them to me. Both the adult-like place and the makeup♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
